description:
All Of Me Eau de Parfum - A Luxurious Oriental Fragrance Experience

Discover the captivating allure of All Of Me EDP, a sophisticated oriental fragrance that embodies elegance and mystery in every drop. This exquisite 90ml perfume creates an unforgettable olfactory journey that lingers beautifully on the skin. âœ¨

The Essence of All Of Me Perfume

This enchanting oriental fragrance opens with vibrant top notes that immediately captivate your senses. The heart notes reveal a sophisticated blend that evolves gracefully, while the base notes provide a rich, lasting foundation that makes All Of Me truly unforgettable. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 90ml
Gender Unisex
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration Eau de Parfum (EDP)
Brand All Of Me

The Luxurious Fragrance Notes of All Of Me

Note Type Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Bergamot, Cardamom, Saffron
Heart Notes Rose, Jasmine, Amber
Base Notes Oud, Vanilla, Musk, Sandalwood

Key Features of All Of Me EDP

  • ðŸ”¥ Long-lasting oriental fragrance with exceptional sillage
  • ðŸ’Ž Luxurious 90ml bottle with elegant design
  • ðŸŒ¿ Rich blend of premium natural ingredients
  • ðŸ’« Sophisticated unisex scent suitable for special occasions
  • âœ¨ Perfect balance between oriental warmth and modern elegance

The All Of Me fragrance line represents the pinnacle of perfumery artistry, created by master perfumers who understand the delicate balance between tradition and innovation. Each bottle is a testament to the brand's commitment to quality and excellence, making it a standout addition to any luxury fragrance collection.

This oud-based perfume draws inspiration from ancient Middle Eastern perfumery traditions while incorporating contemporary elements that appeal to modern fragrance connoisseurs. The result is a timeless oriental fragrance that transcends trends and seasons.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does All Of Me EDP last on the skin?

All Of Me Eau de Parfum offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on the skin due to its high-quality ingredients and EDP concentration. The amber and oud notes in particular contribute to its remarkable staying power, making it ideal for all-day wear or special evening occasions. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on well-moisturized skin. Many users report that the fragrance continues to evolve beautifully throughout the day, with the rich base notes becoming more prominent over time.

Experience the captivating allure of All Of Me EDP - a new arrival that's quickly becoming a signature scent for those who appreciate sophisticated oriental fragrances. ðŸ’«
short_description: Indulge in All Of Me EDP, a luxurious oriental fragrance that blends vibrant bergamot and cardamom with rich rose, jasmine, and exotic oud. This sophisticated 90ml unisex perfume creates an unforgettable signature scent with exceptional longevity and elegant sillage.
seo_title: All Of Me EDP 90ml: #1 Luxury Oriental Fragrance | 8+ Hour Wear
meta_description: Discover All Of Me EDP, a premium oriental fragrance with bergamot, rose, and oud notes. Experience 8+ hours of luxurious scent. Shop this 90ml unisex perfume today!
